item.title: Pseudo TV - Watch your media mindlessly
item.author: Author
item.description: One of the major drawback of media center is that must quite “active” when watching something. Let me explain. Most of the time, you’ll ask yourself “What will I watch today?”. This is not a big effort, but yet still an effort. In this article I will show you a great plugin to watch your media mindlessly. Installing Pseudo TV on #Kodi / #XBMC is really easy.
